page.title: 02A Wragby Schoolboy's Day
page.content: My name is Mark.I am 10 years old.I wake up in the morning at 7.30 then I get dressed.After that I have breakfast.I like frosties or cornflakes,bacon and egg and toast best.Then I get washed and clean my teeth and pick up my packed lunch.(I usually have 4 brown bread sandwiches, an apple,crisps and some sweets or biscuits.)Then I put on my coat, say "Goodbye" to mum and dad and set off. I walk down Louth Road,past the Police Station, the Town Hall and Thornes' works, I cross the road into Silver Street, walk a little further and turn right into school. I go straight into the playground and wait for the whistle to blow before I go inside.
